pages.title: Enchanting
pages.text: Enchanting works the exact same as the old server with a few changes to how you get some.$(br2)We are using the $(n)apotheosis mod$() for enchanting so you can make this guidebook to read how it works.

pages.title: Main Changes
pages.text: There is no more scrapping to get exact enchants but you can still split books to get enchants from individual books.$(br2)The max level for most vanilla enchants is 10 but you need a good enchantment table for this.$(br2)Experience level limit is removed like the last server so you can get to level 100+.
